level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice chiropractic.
Chapters 40 (Health Occupations: General Rules) and 41 (Health Occupations: Administrative Procedures) of this title shall supplement this Chapter.
Notwithstanding anything in Chapter 40 to the contrary, the Board shall only accept applications for licensure by one of the following means:
Reinstatement of an expired, suspended, or revoked license; or

An applicant for a license to practice chiropractic shall submit with a complete application three (3) letters from chiropractors licensed in a jurisdiction of the United States in good standing who have personal knowledge of the applicant’s abilities and qualifications to practice chiropractic.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 302(14) of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6.99, D.C. Code ยง 2-3303.2(14) (1988 Repl. Vol.), 33 DCR 729, 732 (February 7, 1986), and Mayor’s Order 86-110, 33 DCR 5220 (August 22, 1986).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 6658 (September 2, 1988); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 2747, 2750 (May 4, 1990); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 6820 (July 19, 2002); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11237 (December 13, 2002); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 3955 (May 23, 2003); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 7936 (July 25, 2008).
